title: Add third Plain itinerary theme and adjust selected theme controls (remove star icon, wrap long text)

requirements.text: Remove the star logo/icon from the selected Element 1 button (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[3]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/button[1]) without removing or changing the button’s click behavior.

quotes: 1) remove the star logo of element 1

acceptanceCriteria: The Element 1 button renders with no star logo/icon visible (no empty spacing where the icon used to be).
The Element 1 button remains clickable and performs the same action as before.

requirements.text: Ensure the selected Element 2 button’s text wraps onto multiple lines when long, and that the full text content is visible (no truncation/ellipsis) (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[3]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/button[2]).

quotes: 2)  wrap the text of element 2 if it is long and show all of content

acceptanceCriteria: When the Element 2 button label is long, it wraps to the next line(s) within the button instead of truncating.
All characters of the Element 2 button label are visible (no ellipsis) at typical dialog widths.

requirements.text: Add a third itinerary theme option named "Plain" alongside the existing Doodle and Retro themes, selectable via the existing theme controls represented by the selected Element 1 and Element 2 buttons (XPaths above). When Plain is selected, apply a minimal, neutral, "plain itinerary" visual style to ONLY the selected itinerary content elements (Element 3 XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[5]/div[1]/div[7]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1], Element 4 XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[5]/div[1]/div[7]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2], Element 5 XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[5]/div[1]/div[7]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[3]/p[2]).

quotes: Other than Doodle and Retro Theme, add another plain theme for user who prefer plain itinerary theme
yes, add as a third option alongside with Doodle and RETRO

acceptanceCriteria: A third theme option labeled "Plain" is available alongside the existing Doodle and Retro options within the same theme-control area as Element 1 and Element 2.

Selecting "Plain" updates the styling of the selected itinerary elements (Elements 3–5) to a minimal, neutral appearance (e.g., no doodle/illustration effects; subdued borders/shadows; neutral background and text).
Switching between Doodle, Retro, and Plain updates styling accordingly, without changing any non-selected elements outside the specified XPaths.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the 5 selected elements identified by the provided XPath expressions (and code that directly renders/styles those exact elements).
Do not edit files in frontend immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, and frontend/src/components/ui/*).
Use English for any user-facing text (e.g., the new theme label must be "Plain").
nonGoals: Do not introduce new authentication methods or third-party identity providers.
Do not add new backend data models or persistence for themes unless already required by existing UI (theme selection can remain UI-only if that is how Doodle/Retro currently work).
Do not restyle the entire app globally; only adjust styling related to the selected elements and their theme representations.
